history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01633
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION INTO THE OFFICIAL ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE PHILIPPINE DEPOSIT INSURANCE CORPORATION (PDIC) IN RELATION TO THE FRAUD INVESTIGATION REPORTS ON THE TRANSACTIONS OF THE DEFUNCT EXPORT AND INDUSTRY BANK (EIB), ITS SUBSIDIARIES, MAJOR STOCKHOLDERS, DIRECTORS AND OFFICERS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BELARO, SALVADOR JR. B.
DATE FILED : 2018-01-31
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2018-03-20
          -The body required the PDIC to submit the documents required by Rep. Belaro, i.e. 19 FIRs within 3 weeks.
      2. Referred to Stakeholders on 2018-11-13
          -Committee approved for the issuance of subpoena duces tecum to Atty. Antonette Bolivar-Tan, legal counsel of PDIC; Mr. Roberto Tan, Head of PDIC and the Head of Alba Romeo, the group commissioned by PDIC to conduct the fraud investigation reports, for the production of 21 fraud investigation reports.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BANKS AND FINANCIAL INTERMEDIARIES ON 2018-02-13
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2018-02-05;
